name: One For All
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control named All Might. If All Might isn't on the battlefield, you may search your library for him and put him onto the battlefield.
flavorText: "Aizawa, you told me to live without regrets, didn't you? All Might has never once thought of himself, he only cares about the safety of others. That's why I respect him with all my heart. And I won't let him down now! This is my power!! ONE FOR ALL!!!"
